TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceCertificateElement extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement

Docs.summary: Represents the element in a configuration file.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The `<serviceCertificate>` element is a child element of the `<federationConfiguration>` element and configures the X.509 certificate, if any, that is used to encrypt and decrypt tokens when using WS-Federation.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationElement.ServiceCertificate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is an instance of ServiceCertificateElement.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets or sets the child element for this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `<certificateReference>` element contains settings that specify the location and verification parameters for the X.509 certificate to use to encrypt and decrypt tokens.
